name: Doug (Paks)
description:
It seems you've lost your way. ..

You forgot everything except doug... 

You need to get home... 

Explore the post-apocalyptic world in 3 different levels before the timer runs out.

Controls:
WASD - Player Movement
Space - Jump
Hold SHIFT - Run

Programmers:
https://claw.itch.io/
https://paksuuu.itch.io

Artists:
https://cheeeeesecake.itch.io/
https://www.instagram.com/clishhhh/

Music by Pix.
Sound effects from freesound.org.
